page.title: 11Beckingham(Lincs) _ Children
page.content: In the parish of Beckingham and Sutton there are 68 children, 33 boys and 35 girls. Unfortunately the village has no schools therefore the children have to travel out of the village to attend school. Eleven out of the fifteen junior school children attend the Brant Broughton Primary school which is some 3 miles away. Fifteen children of secondary school age attend the comprehensive school at Welbourn and a further sixteen attend schools in Sleaford and Newark. There are nine children who go to the playschool at Brant Broughton and a further fourteen young children and babies. The main activity for the children is the playing field but for the last two years most successful village Christmas parties have been arranged.
